scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules/react-atlas && rimraf node_modules/react-atlas-core && rimraf node_modules/react-atlas-default-theme
scripts.prod: npm run clean && npm install && webpack && cp ../react-atlas/packages/react-atlas-default-theme/lib/atlasThemes.min.css public/scripts && node index.js
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm install && webpack && node index.js
scripts.analyze: npm run clean && npm install && webpack --config webpack.analyzer.config.js && node index.js
